original_title: Juice=Juice OTODAMA SEA STUDIO 2018 ~J=J Summer Special~
overview: OTODAMA SEA STUDIO 2018 ~J=J Summer Special~ was Juice=Juice's 2018 summer live at OTODAMA SEA STUDIO. It took place on August 6, 2018.  The DVD was released on November 27, 2018 for fanclub and UP-FRONT WORKS Web Store pre-orders,[1][2][3] and it was released for general sale on December 5, 2018.
title: Juice=Juice OTODAMA SEA STUDIO 2018 ~J=J Summer Special~
